Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 88th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1965...
Injured on 9/4/1965 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1970, off Bob Gleich (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1971, off Bill Benson (NE)...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/7/1974 to a 4-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/30/1976 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 8/21/1976 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Penn on 4/21/1977...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/14/1978 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Syracuse on 9/8/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/2/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/12/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $2,020,000 per year...
Injured on 5/15/1982 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 7/25/1982...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
